overview:
Dr Lorimer Moseley is a clinician and researcher with a special interest in pain and brain sciences.

His website BodyinMind.com.au looks at the relationship between the body, the brain and the mind and how they interact particularly in chronic and complex pain disorders. The team explores how the mind influences physiological regulation of the body and how to can teach people about it all in a way that is both interesting and accurate.

He is author of Painful Yarns. Metaphors & stories to help understand the biology of pain, and co-author with David Butler, of Explain Pain.
